about_the_game:
Embark on a heartwarming journey through a world of comfort and secrets as you race to seek out a cure for your ailing father, all while discovering the hidden depths of your own mind.

In this captivating cozy adventure you'll experience charming landscapes and heartening encounters with whimsical characters. Yet, beneath the surface, our protagonist's fractured psyche may reveal that all is not what it seems. Join our hero on an adventure that blends the warmth of nostalgia with the profound exploration of grief, offering a unique and emotionally charged experience.


Like every normal child, you have a best friend too - his name is Bricky! When you're in a pinch Bricky is there for you - just try not to forget where you left him! You can throw him, talk with him, see him in your dreams, and other normal things too!



As you explore the land around you, you'll find plenty of weapons and armor pieces to keep you ready for anything. 99% of the armor and weapons you find in Greenwood Falls will be completely unique. The stats that come with these found and bought weapons and armor can't be predicted.

Weapons can contain Elemental Magic properties! Use the powers of Fire, Water, Thunder, and Nature to assist you along the way. Don't forget to learn about Farming if you want to personalize and upgrade your awesome equipment.



Go on and grab your watering can, you've got some berries to grow! Growing berries can be a bit tedious, but with a little effort you'll be rewarded. Berries are used to upgrade anything that can be upgraded - just don't forget to water them.



Have you had enough of RPG fishing? Well get ready to dive into the fish of Greenwood Falls. Depending on the location, the weather, the time of day, and even the phase of the moon - you'll have your hands full collecting the 12 different species of fish.



If the fishing doesn't bug you, the bugs will! See if you can find all 8 species of bugs throughout Greenwood Falls. Depending on location, weather, time of day, and yes the moon again - finding all the different bugs could be tricky.



Just when you thought there weren't enough things to do in Greenwood Falls, try your hand at catching some Frogs! Not all frogs are built the same though, you'll learn that in the Frog Arena. Enter your best Frog and see if they can eat their way to the top and claim victory.



It's not all sunshine and flowers in Greenwood Falls, prepare to face some challenging foes if you choose to head off into the darkness. You'll find plenty of secrets scattered around Greenwood Falls to keep you guessing, and plenty of baddies to keep you on your toes. Perhaps you'll discover things about yourself that were meant to stay buried...

name: Greenwood Falls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a crazy cozy journey to find medicine for your father.
